text: When asked about the scandal on the red carpet at the October premiere for her Broadway play, “ The Parisian Woman, ” an intrigue about a glamorous woman in President Trump ’ s Washington written by “ House of Cards ” creator Beau Willimon, she looked steely and said she was waiting to feel less angry before she talked about it. “ I used the word ‘ anger ’ but I was more worried about crying, to tell you the truth, ” she says now. “ I was not a groundbreaker on a story I knew to be true.
